00006 #include <string>
00007 #include "ORVDataDecoder.hh"

00009 class ORVHistDecoder : virtual public ORVDataDecoder
00010 {
00011   public:
00012     ORVHistDecoder() {}
00013     virtual ~ORVHistDecoder() {}
00014 
00015     // Functions for histogram booking. By default, the x-binning assumes
00016     // the x-values are integers running from 0 to NbinsX-1.
00017     virtual std::string GetHistName(int iHist) = 0;
00018     virtual std::string GetHistTitle(int iHist) = 0;
00019     virtual std::string GetXTitle() = 0;
00020     virtual size_t GetNbinsX() = 0;
00021     virtual double GetXLo() { return -0.5; }
00022     virtual double GetXHi() { return GetNbinsX() - 0.5; }
00023 
00024     // Functions for histogram filling
00025     virtual int GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record) = 0; // user must define an indexing scheme
00026     virtual size_t GetNEntries(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00027     virtual double GetX(UInt_t* record, size_t i) = 0; // the variable to be histogrammed
00028     virtual double GetWeight(UInt_t* /*record*/, size_t /*i*/) // optional: weight the entry
00029       { return 1.0; } 
00030 
00031     // Optional: multi-dimensional
00032     virtual inline size_t GetNDim() { return 1; }
00033     virtual std::string GetYTitle() { return "Y"; }
00034     virtual inline double GetY(UInt_t* /*record*/, size_t /*i*/) { return 0.0; }
00035     virtual inline size_t GetNbinsY() { return 1; }
00036     virtual inline double GetYLo() { return -0.5; }
00037     virtual inline double GetYHi() { return GetNbinsY() - 0.5; }
00038     virtual std::string GetZTitle() { return "Z"; }
00039     virtual inline double GetZ(UInt_t* /*record*/, size_t /*i*/) { return 0.0; }
00040     virtual inline size_t GetNbinsZ() { return 1; }
00041     virtual inline double GetZLo() { return -0.5; }
00042     virtual inline double GetZHi() { return GetNbinsZ() - 0.5; }
00043 };
